verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609> of David <WH1732>. LORD <WH3068>, my heart <WH3820> is not haughty <WH1361>, nor mine eyes <WH5869> lofty <WH7311>: neither do I exercise <WH1980> myself in great matters <WH1419>, or in things too high <WH6381> for me.
Surely I have behaved <WH7737> and quieted <WH1826> myself <WH5315>, as a child that is weaned <WH1580> of his mother <WH517>: my soul <WH5315> is even as a weaned child <WH1580>.
Let Israel <WH3478> hope <WH3176> in the LORD <WH3068> from henceforth and for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.
